text: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

translation.en: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses
translation.id: Lalu para pesihir itu merunduk bersujud, seraya berkata, "Kami telah percaya kepada Tuhannya Harun dan Musa
